title: PrinceVisser
author: PrinceVisser
content: Hi. I want to promote my business here on BTalk but I don't have the necessary rank to do that. By buying a copper membership, can I wear a profile pic + signature or I need to get merit first? Thanks!

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.created_time: May 09, 2022, 01:44:21 PMLast edit: May 09, 2022, 02:07:06 PM by OmegaStarScream
comments.body: No, you're not going to be able to wear a profile picture, you'll need to become a full member for that. This is[1] what you'll get with the copper membership.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2385104.msg24371150#msg24371150

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Avatar - you need rank at least full member, of course you need a minimum of 100 merit and 120 activity. Signature - each rank has different max character and styling, copper membership's signature almost close to member rank.

comments.author: DdmrDdmr
comments.body: Quote from: PrinceVisser on May 09, 2022, 01:42:30 PM<...>Just the Signature (not the profile Avatar), similar to that of a Member (as per this post).Signature capabilities vary per Rank, so make sure to check that they apply to your needs:Quote from: theymos on February 26, 2014, 09:15:18 PMPerhaps the allowed signature styling should change with activity score / membergroup. Like:- Newbie: No styling (including links) allowed. Max 40 characters.- Jr. Member: Links allowed. Max 100 characters.- Member: Unlimited length.- Full: Color allowed.- Sr. Member: Size allowed- Hero: Background color allowed<...>Consider Member as the rank equivalent for Copper Members. Also ignore the Newbie entry in the above quote (it's outdated and no longer applies).

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: aside from what the others have said, you can also try and hire someone to advertise your business for you, it would most likely be more expensive than buying a copper membership. to be honest, having only a signature is more than enough to properly advertise your business.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: PrinceVisser on May 09, 2022, 01:42:30 PMHi. I want to promote my business here on BTalk but I don't have the necessary rank to do that. By buying a copper membership, can I wear a profile pic + signature or I need to get merit first? Thanks!Copper membership, only for sigs that match the member's rank, for signatures: full, Senior, Hero, Legen can't, profile photos also can't if you buy copper members.If you want to do business here there are other alternatives, maybe you can recruit other members who meet the requirements for the business or an established manager, see here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0, who knows you have the desire to do so, rent, if you have the funds.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: PrinceVisser on May 09, 2022, 01:42:30 PMHi. I want to promote my business here on BTalk but I don't have the necessary rank to do that. By buying a copper membership, can I wear a profile pic + signature or I need to get merit first? Thanks!You can promote it yourself with simple signature until you rank up, but there are other ways you can promote your business in bitcointalk forum.One of them is to create signature campaign, hire manager and other members can promote it for you and get paid for that.Other way for promotion is purchasing ad space in Auctions created by theymos, and you can read more about rules and everything else here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5393608.0

comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on May 09, 2022, 02:35:57 PMYou can promote it yourself with simple signature until you rank up, but there are other ways you can promote your business in bitcointalk forum.The OP would not be able to post any signature unless they get at least one merit to rank up to Jr. Member or if they buy copper membership, the period of signatures for newbie has been disabled for sometime now. comments.body: Quote from: PrinceVisser on May 09, 2022, 01:42:30 PMI want to promote my business here on BTalkI think that you can easily already start with an ANNouncement thread about your business (and here copper membership can indeed help with allowing you post images).Then, afaik, copper membership should allow you have at least links in the signature.Will this be enough for you? I'm not so sure. If you want to advertise it a lot, you'll need to post a lot. As already said, getting more people wear your signature may be the way forward.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: PrinceVisser on May 09, 2022, 01:42:30 PMHi. I want to promote my business here on BTalk but I don't have the necessary rank to do that. By buying a copper membership, can I wear a profile pic + signature or I need to get merit first? Thanks!The picture you wore on your profile is called avatar while the long codes you post on your profile signatory space for the signature you want to wear, before you can wear an avatar you have to become a full member rank with 100 meirts and at least 120 activities, the copper membership you buy will only allow you to post images for the sake of your threads service announcement or any evidence that will warrant you posting an image, you can also wear a signature from a jr member rank without obtaining a copper membership.

comments.author: DdmrDdmr
comments.body: Quote from: rubidrive on March 06, 2023, 03:31:37 PM<…> I followed the indications that are in the forum, I already made the payment but I still don't see the Copper member option <…>Are you sure that your payment TX has received at least 1 confirmation? The network is working on steeper fees during long intervals of the day (thanks to Ordinals bloating the network), so if you paid relatively small fees, your TX may still be in queue to be processed (thus you wouldn’t be seeing the "wear" options yet).See: https://mempool.space/
